title: Couldn't build racer with parallel codegen
body:
I was trying to build `racer`'s master (`abef71c37c312a80fe1d9d8a8c7e5b7416849df8`) with recent nightly with `-C codegen_units=4`:

```
➜  racer git:(master) cargo rustc --verbose -- -C codegen_units=4           
       Fresh regex-syntax v0.1.2
       Fresh libc v0.1.8
       Fresh unicode-xid v0.0.1
       Fresh rustc-serialize v0.3.14
       Fresh bitflags v0.2.1
       Fresh term v0.2.7
       Fresh regex v0.1.33
       Fresh log v0.3.1
       Fresh toml v0.1.20
       Fresh syntex_syntax v0.6.0
   Compiling racer v0.0.1 (file:///home/mkpankov/racer)
     Running `rustc src/main.rs --crate-name racer --crate-type bin -g -C codegen_units=4 --out-dir /home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug -L dependency=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps --extern env_logger=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps/libenv_logger-9877a407b506c549.rlib --extern log=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps/liblog-8a6aba167994951e.rlib --extern syntex_syntax=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps/libsyntex_syntax-6466c41f4a8764ed.rlib --extern toml=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps/libtoml-b002bc7593e9dadd.rlib`
       Fresh env_logger v0.3.1
rustc: /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/llvm/lib/IR/Constants.cpp:1622: static llvm::Constant* llvm::ConstantExpr::getPointerCast(llvm::Constant*, llvm::Type*): Assertion `S->getType()->isPtrOrPtrVectorTy() && "Invalid cast"' failed.
Could not compile `racer`.

Caused by:
  Process didn't exit successfully: `rustc src/main.rs --crate-name racer --crate-type bin -g -C codegen_units=4 --out-dir /home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug -L dependency=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps --extern env_logger=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps/libenv_logger-9877a407b506c549.rlib --extern log=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps/liblog-8a6aba167994951e.rlib --extern syntex_syntax=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps/libsyntex_syntax-6466c41f4a8764ed.rlib --extern toml=/home/mkpankov/racer/target/debug/deps/libtoml-b002bc7593e9dadd.rlib` (signal: 6)
➜  racer git:(master) rustc --version
rustc 1.2.0-nightly (2228ce10c 2015-06-09)
➜  racer git:(master) cargo --version
cargo 0.3.0-nightly (2ac8a86 2015-06-10) (built 2015-06-10)
```
